00025 Define_Module(UDPSink);

00028 void UDPSink::initialize()
00029 {
00030     numReceived = 0;
00031     WATCH(numReceived);
00032 
00033     int port = par("localPort");
00034     if (port!=-1)
00035         bindToPort(port);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void UDPSink::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00039 {
00040     processPacket(PK(msg));
00041 
00042     if (ev.isGUI())
00043     {
00044         char buf[32];
00045         sprintf(buf, "rcvd: %d pks", numReceived);
00046         getDisplayString().setTagArg("t",0,buf);
00047     }
00048 
00049 }
00050 
00051 void UDPSink::processPacket(cPacket *msg)
00052 {
00053     EV << "Received packet: ";
00054     printPacket(msg);
00055     delete msg;
00056 
00057     numReceived++;
00058 }
